title: Give me a reading list of 20 articles up to 2020 about interpretability and analysis of neural network models behaviors in natural language processing (NLP

Here is a list of 20 articles up to 2020 that discuss interpretability and analysis of neural network models'
Interpretable Machine Learning for Natural Language Processing" by Ali Eslami, et al
- This paper provides an overview of interpretable machine learning techniques for NLP tasks, including attention mechanisms, rule extraction, and rule-based models
Explaining Neural Networks for Sentiment Analysis
- This paper proposes a method for interpreting neural network models for sentiment analysis tasks, using attention maps and rule-based explanations

They cover a range of techniques and approaches, from attention mechanisms to rule-based models, and from visualizing and explaining neural network predictions to interpretable machine learning techniques.<|endoftext|>
